fomod.Name: SexLabHentaiPregnancy Special Edition
fomod.Author: Ed86
fomod.Description:
changes since SexLabHentaiPregnancy V1.19: fixed missing properties fixed scripts to support Sexlab Framework v1.59c+ increased active pregnancies 20->50 increased max possible pregnancy duration to 270 +-10% days Support for SexLab Inflation Framework Support for SL Separate Orgasms Support for EC/ES/ED - their pregnancies block pregnancy, cuminflation will still happen changed default scaling to NetImmerse Override(makes mod compatible will all other bodychanging mods) added breast and belly scale toggles added milking added soulgem birthing added toggle to allow non unique npcs pregnancy added script checks so birthing/milking wont be interrupted by sexlab (and maybe other mods) added HentaiPregnantFaction to detect pregnancy type/state, without dependency for HP added HentaiLactatingFaction to detect lactation, rank=milk full mcm translation support full script translation support something else
TODOornotTODO: female cycle more pregnancy effects
